attributes.action: Change the law on train fines
attributes.background: Train companies are taking advantage of the fine system. Just recently I had a fine even tho I had the money in hand to buy a ticket, I was then treated like a common criminal. People up and down the UK are getting the same treatment and it needs to stop. fine the actual dodgers not the payers

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition in its current form as it does not call for a clear action from the UK Government and Parliament. For example your petition does not set out what change in the law you would like to see. You could start a petition calling for a specific action/change in the law in relation to train fines.
